traits.label: name
traits.name: :name
traits.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL

traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Any number to indicate the given value of the knob. Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use the v-model directive

traits.label: min
traits.name: :min
traits.desc: The minimum value that the model (the knob value) should start at

traits.label: max
traits.name: :max
traits.desc: The maximum value that the model (the knob value) should go to

traits.label: inner-min
traits.name: :inner-min
traits.desc: Inner minimum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be higher or equal to 'min' prop; Defaults to 'min' prop

traits.label: inner-max
traits.name: :inner-max
traits.desc: Inner maximum value of the model; Use in case you need the model value to be inside of the track's min-max values; Needs to be lower or equal to 'max' prop; Defaults to 'max' prop

traits.label: step
traits.name: :step
traits.desc: A number representing steps in the value of the model, while adjusting the knob

traits.label: reverse
traits.name: :reverse
traits.desc: Reverses the direction of progress

traits.label: instant-feedback
traits.name: :instant-feedback
traits.desc: No animation when model changes

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: center-color
traits.name: :center-color
traits.desc: Color name for the center part of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: track-color
traits.name: :track-color
traits.desc: Color name for the track of the component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: font-size
traits.name: :font-size
traits.desc: Size of text in CSS units, including unit name. Suggestion: use 'em' units to sync with component size

traits.label: thickness
traits.name: :thickness
traits.desc: Thickness of progress arc as a ratio (0.0 < x < 1.0) of component size

traits.label: angle
traits.name: :angle
traits.desc: Angle to rotate progress arc by

traits.label: show-value
traits.name: :show-value
traits.desc: Enables the default slot and uses it (if available), otherwise it displays the 'value' prop as text; Make sure the text has enough space to be displayed inside the component

traits.label: tabindex
traits.name: :tabindex
traits.desc: Tabindex HTML attribute value

traits.label: disable
traits.name: :disable
traits.desc: Put component in disabled mode

traits.label: readonly
traits.name: :readonly
traits.desc: Put component in readonly mode
